name: Foodnutsland
description:
A short point-and-click adventure where you forage to make a feast for your friends ... but you'll have to make some friends first!

You have limited time each day to explore the forest. There are 40 food items to collect and 6 animals to make friends with. Each animal you befriend will bring you a gift for your home. 

Created during Global Game Jam 2021 by: 

  • GJ Lee
  • Brian S. Chung
  • Christine Fouron
  • Olivia Zuern

Patrons can access a postmortem of this game here about our design goals, process goals, ways we were economic about the art / animation / programming, and our reflections on the prototype and process.
